argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_bj-dfif5 | |- ( if- ( ph , ps , ch ) <-> ( ( ph /\ ps ) \/ ( -. ph /\ ch ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ps ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( -. ph /\ ch ) -> ch ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_orim12i | |- ( ( ( ph /\ ps ) \/ ( -. ph /\ ch ) ) -> ( ps \/ ch ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_sylbi | |- ( if- ( ph , ps , ch ) -> ( ps \/ ch ) ) |
